title: Footballers' Wives - Extra Time
overview: Just as their counterparts in Footballers' Wives, they are beautiful, filthy rich and can have anything money can buy. Meet Anika Beevor the sister of super-bitch Tanya Turner, if you thought Tanya was bad wait till you see Anika in action. Bruno is introduced to two teenage children he never knew he had, Amber says goodbye to Conrad and Seb falls for Yasmin, Bruno's teenaged Daughter.
